channel.title: Posts on Day day up
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Day day up

item.title: Photoswipe Gallery Sample
item.author: im_Luxqi@163.com (XingQi.wang)
item.description: Beautiful Hugo adds a few custom shortcodes created by Li-Wen Yip and Gert-Jan van den Berg for making galleries with PhotoSwipe .

item.title: Big Image Sample
item.author: im_Luxqi@163.com (XingQi.wang)
item.description: The image banners at the top of the page are refered to as “bigimg” in this theme. They are optional, and one more more can be specified. If more than one is specified, the images rotate every 10 seconds. In the front matter, bigimgs are specified using an array of hashes.

item.title: Code Sample
item.author: im_Luxqi@163.com (XingQi.wang)
item.description: The following are two code samples using syntax highlighting.

item.title: Flake it till you make it
item.author: im_Luxqi@163.com (XingQi.wang)
item.description: Under what circumstances should we step off a path? When is it essential that we finish what we start? If I bought a bag of peanuts and had an allergic reaction, no one would fault me if I threw it out. If I ended a relationship with a woman who hit me, no one would say that I had a commitment problem. But if I walk away from a seemingly secure route because my soul has other ideas, I am a flake?

item.title: Test markdown
item.author: im_Luxqi@163.com (XingQi.wang)
item.description: You can write regular markdown here and Jekyll will automatically convert it to a nice webpage. I strongly encourage you to take 5 minutes to learn how to write in markdown - it’ll teach you how to transform regular text into bold/italics/headings/tables/etc. Here is some bold text Here is a secondary heading Here’s a useless table: Number Next number Previous number Five Six Four Ten Eleven Nine Seven Eight Six Two Three One How about a yummy crepe?

item.title: Using
item.author: im_Luxqi@163.com (XingQi.wang)
item.description: 刚刚开始写blog,有写markdown,hugo书写规范不太熟悉，总结写用的比较多的，方便日后查阅。 坚持，加油！！！ Markdown and hugo [markdown官网](https://www.markdowntutorial.com/) 显示代码块 `单行显示` 1 `单行显示` 2 3 ```javascript 多行stytle1 var num1, num2, sum num1 = prompt("Enter first number") num2 = prompt("Enter second number") sum = parseInt(num1) + parseInt(num2) // "+" means "add" alert("Sum = " + sum) // "+" means combine into a string ``` 1 ```javascript 2多行stytle1 3var num1, num2, sum 4num1 = prompt("Enter first number") 5num2 = prompt("Enter second number") 6sum = parseInt(num1) + parseInt(num2) // "+" means "add" 7alert("Sum = " + sum) // "+" means combine into a string 8``` 9 10 1 多行stytle2 2 var num1, num2, sum 3 num1 = prompt("Enter first number") 4 num2 = prompt("Enter second number") 5 sum = parseInt(num1) + parseInt(num2) // "+" means "add" 6 alert("Sum = " + sum) // "+" means combine into a string 7 8 1 <div class="highlight"><pre class="chroma"><code class="language-javascript" data-lang="javascript"><span class="ln">1</span> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">num1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">num2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">sum</span> 2<span class="ln">2</span> <span class="nx">num1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">prompt</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;Enter first number&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span> 3<span class="ln">3</span> <span class="nx">num2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">prompt</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;Enter second number&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span> 4<span class="ln">4</span> <span class="nx">sum</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nb">parseInt</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">num1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nb">parseInt</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">num2</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1">// &#34;+&#34; means &#34;add&#34; 5</span><span class="ln">5</span><span class="c1"></span> <span class="nx">alert</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;Sum = &#34;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">sum</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="c1">// &#34;+&#34; means combine into a string 6</span><span class="ln">6</span><span class="c1"></span> 7<span class="ln">7</span></code></pre></div> 8 9 显示图片 [gallery](https://github.
